alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geneva, south central Houston, northwestern Jackson, north central Walton, Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to 8 miles southwest of Samson. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Bonifay, Geneva, Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Hartford, Taylor, Slocomb, Samson, Union, Malvern, Cottondale, Caryville, Esto, Madrid, Westville, Campbellton, Coffee Springs, Noma and Black. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
